indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX claim_split_requests_pending_unique ON public.claim_split_requests USING btree (item_id, requester_id, original_claimer_id) WHERE (status = 'pending'::text)

CREATE INDEX idx_claim_split_requests_item ON public.claim_split_requests USING btree (item_id)
